Like for complex question we can ask the user to enter message in ai bot and the message will automatically go to the administrator and response can be given using  notification in bot or email ,OR we can integrate human representative if possible.
yes like groq supports multiple language so we can use it for multiple language integration we can add voice assistant to for disables.
yes for sure we can integrate these features too
The chatbot could guide patients with necessary documents and procedures before their visit and send reminders for follow-ups, medications, or test results after their visit.
